MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  G44 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Gordon Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:39am . Our engineers are on their way to the Ormonde Substation to investigate  and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:36am on the 14th of April 2021
